Description: Please Note: The Curvacious Corner & Shellyz Rockz Vixen is Open, Monday-Thursday 10a-6p PST, Friday 10:00-3p PST & we are totally Closed on Saturday & Sunday, until our Physical Store is opened in Sacramento, California.We are also closed on all Holidays. We are very busy doing inventory & getting ready to list many more items. Thank you so very much for visiting "The Curvacious Corner" & "Shellyz Rockz Vixen", the Store that carries all your "Plus Size" needs, for the Sexy, Sweet, Classy, Rocker or Curvy Woman & have added our Accessories Dept. for Men/Unisex as well. We appreciate your business & look forward to your return. Please allow up to 5 Business days for processing. We are fairly new Stores & we have thousands of items to list. I have many types of items to add........ ClothingAccessoriesShoes Purses Make-Up Bags Mens, Womens & Unisex Jewelry, Rocker Cuffs, Gloves, Studded & Spiked Accessories & more! Items are from the Stores listed below & we carry "Name Brands", for all listings to come & in all sizes. We've added a Fashion Jewelry Dept. "Shellyz Rockz Vixen", just for you! A lot of the Wrist & Neck Jewelry, is Plus Size or Mens XL sizes, to accommodate Plus Sized Wrists. Feel free to browse our Jewelry, mostly targeted for the young, but of course, like us, the young at heart. I call myself a Recycled Teenager, HaHa. Age, Weight & Height are only numbers my friends, therefore; We are only as young as we act or want to be. Never Grow Up, It's a Trap! Lol. Here's the Stores & Brands I have to add for your shopping pleasure: Torrid, Hot Topic, Lane Bryant, Juicy, Betsy Johnson, Macy Woman, Avenue, Fashion Bug, JCPenney, Claires, Dress Barn, Coldwater Creek, Nordstroms, Vocal PS, Fashion Bug, Old Navy, Forever 21 (Juniors) & so many more. You won't find many items from Walmart or Kmart, or other cheap stores, however; it's because, we here at "The Curvacious Corner", believe in buying Quality clothing, that will have a long life of use & it seems their sizes aren't true to fit. :) Don't forget to check out our Facebook page that shares Memes & Positive Support for the "Plus Size" Community! Have a beautiful day. Sharing Curvy & Rocker Love around the World. <3 Shellz, Chrissy & Denise Owner & Employee's Never Forget to ~ "Love Your Curves" ~ Thank you so very much for visiting "The Curvacious Corner" & "Shellyz Rockz Vixen", the Store that carries all your "Plus Size" clothing, Accessories, Shoes, Beauty Products, Rockwear & Rock Memorabilia needs. We promote the Sexy, Sweet, Classy & Curvy Woman, along with our Lover's of Rock~n~Roll, (Male & Female) . We appreciate your business & look forward to your return. Our hours are as follows: Monday-Thursday 10a-6p PST, Friday 10a-1p, Saturday & Sunday we are closed. We are also closed on all Holidays that are honored by the USA. <3 :-) Please allow 5 Business days for processing your order & allow shipping time. Shipping out "sold" items is our 'PRIORITY', therefore; if you need specific measurements on an item, it may take a few days for us to get back to you. We have 4 Employees working hard to make our store more fun. The Owner, does not work in the store, she is Retired. Please be patient with us, as we have 2 new staff members that we are training!
